name: On The Away
description:
city skater - rule the skate park is all about skating and trying new Tricks like Jumps, Stunts in the air while Flying and to be an Epic skater!

Take your skating skills to a whole new level and hit the streets like a true skater boy!

The player loves his skateboard and also skating. He likes to show his skills on the road. But skating on the road is not easy. There are many obstacles on the road. So, he just skates like his way and shows his skills to everyone on the road.

Features:

- Beautiful graphics to enhance this skating game!

- Unlimited levels of skateboard fun

- Exciting skateboard sound effects and music
